testcase.classname: perform payment on prepaid BCA customer
testcase.name: payment to prepaid BCA customer
testcase.system-out: Given user logged in with BCA customer......................................passed When customer should have existing prepaid offer and BA.....................passed Then user navigate to BA page...............................................passed Then user click on payment tab..............................................passed Then user click on new payment button.......................................passed Then user enters the amount and click on create button......................passed Then payment should be created..............................................passed
